/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky overhead is filled with clouds, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban architecture and natural elements.
